import React from 'react'; function Card({pokemon}){
  • return(

    {pokemon.id}

    {pokemon.name}

    {pokemon.types.map(type =>{ return (

    {type.type.name}

    ); })}

    Weight

    {pokemon.weight}

    Height

    {pokemon.height}

    Ability

    {pokemon.abilities[0].ability.name}

    )
    • } export default Card;
